events.title: Årskonference for undervisere på videregående uddannelser
events.description: Kom og oplev Nikolaj Sonne fra DR2’s tech-program ”So ein Ding”, som på årets konference gør os klogere på kunstig intelligens og, hvad der driver disse tankeprocessorer. Efter foredraget vil der være workshops, hvor du sammen med andre undervisere fra videregående uddannelser debattere og diskutere konkrete dilemmaer.

events.title: Symposium on AI Opportunities and Challenges (SAIOC)
events.description: This one-day online Symposium will bring together a range of thought leaders in the field of Artificial Intelligence who will collectively explore the current state of AI as it is applied in education.

events.title: CLAI opening seminar
events.description: CLAI invites to its opening seminar on September 20th at Aarhus University, where the theme is the state-of-the-art of Large Language Models.

events.title: AI Denmark Summit
events.description: Er du klar til at omfavne mulighederne inden for kunstig intelligens? Og savner du inspiration til, hvordan man bedst anvender teknologien?

events.title: Digital Tech Summit
events.description: Digital Tech Summit – AI Transforming Business 2023 is the largest deep tech conference in the Nordic countries and the annual meeting place for researchers from the country's universities, their partners in Danish industry, startups and students from all danish universities.

events.title: The Future of Digital Technology Education
events.description: The Future of Digital Technology Education is a public event which addresses the present and future status of digital technology education in Danish higher education system.

events.title: AI og data - hvordan får du styr på det?
events.description: Kom med når TechDialog denne gang gør dig klogere på, hvordan du får styr på AI og data.

events.title: Workshop: Byg din egen digitale tvilling
events.description: Byg en digital tvilling for ét af dine produkter og kom med på bølgen!

events.title: Åbningskonference for det nye Videnscenter for Digital Teknologiforståelse
events.description: Københavns Professionshøjskole inviterer til åbningen af det nye Videnscenter for Digital Teknologiforståelse.

events.title: Danmarks Digitale Kompetencer 2023
events.description: Er de danske virksomheder klar til AI?

events.title: Generative Methods
events.description: AI as Collaborator and Companion in the Social Sciences and Humanities.

events.title: Common sense for humans and machines: Making decisions in the absence of information
events.description: Artificial intelligence, deep neural networks, and machine learning systems all make use of data, lots of data. But what about the data or information that is not present? The absent?

events.title: APPLIED AI LUNCH TALKS - FORCE TECHNOLOGY AND THE EUROPEAN TESTING AND EXPERIMENTATION FACILITY (TEF)
events.description: This talk is for SMEs, investors, lab responsibles, and buyers of AI and Robotics as well as others with an interest in how tests can provide trust, validation, and market potential of specific solutions.

events.title: AI: ChatGPT - Fra Hype til Realitet: Næstved
events.description: Bliv opdateret med den nyeste viden og få praktiske tips og tricks til at udnytte AI's potentiale til at drive din virksomheds succes. Du vil høre om: Introduktion til Kunstig intelligens og hvad fremtiden bringer, hvilke AI værktøjer er der og hands-on med ChatGPT og generative AI - hvordan holder du styr på de juridiske risici, når du tager det i brug i forretningen?

events.title: Deltag i workshop med AI-kunstner Cecilie Waagner Falkenstrøm
events.description: Vær med til at sætte dit præg på et nyt kunstværk, hvor kunstig intelligens møder menneskelige værdier

events.title: Nordic AI & Metaverse Summit
events.description: Danish Industry (DI) and the Copenhagen Institute for Futures Studies (CIFS) have once again joined forces to let Nordic stakeholders investigate AI, and the immersive internet will develop across industries. This allows you to be prepared for what is to come and become aware of the impact it might have on your business - whether your organisation is a private entity or a governmental institution.

events.title: FORMIDDAGSBRIEFING VERSION2: Generativ AI
events.description: Version2 inviterer til en formiddag, hvor vi ser nærmere på generativ AI. Potentiale og implikationer sættes til debat.

events.title: FORMIDDAGSBRIEFING VERSION2: AI i sundhedssektoren
events.description: Join the briefing to explore the role and impact of AI in the healthcare sector.
